examples.sentence: Add just a dab of chili oil to the wonton soup.
Her makeup requires only a dab of foundation.
He gave the crying baby gentle dabs with a tissue.
The painter finished with light dabs of the brush.
We caught three dabs during our fishing trip.
Dab is often served grilled with lemon in coastal towns.
She's a dab at making dumplings with perfect pleats.
The old carpenter is a dab with traditional joinery.
Dab your face dry instead of rubbing after washing.
The artist dabbed paint onto the canvas with quick motions.
She dabbed at her eyes with a silk handkerchief.
Dab the stain gently with club soda before washing.
My grandma is a dab hand at making mooncakes.
Dab on some tiger balm for mosquito bites.
Kids were dabbling in the fountain like happy ducklings.
She dabbled her toes in the hotel pool while scrolling TikTok.
The panda kept dabbling at the bamboo shoots with its paws.
He absently dabbles with his chopsticks during video meetings.
This influencer dabbles in oil painting between livestreams.
Many programmers dabble in stand-up comedy nowadays.
A Didi driver dabble my new sneakers while washing his car.
The boiling hotpot dabble the table with chili oil.
CEOs who dabble in rap always go viral.
The ducklings were happy dabblers in the park pond.
As a dabbler in the fountain, the toddler giggled with water splashing around.
He's not a professional painter, just a dabbler in watercolors.
Most language dabblers quit before reaching intermediate level.
As a dabbler in philosophy, she enjoys reading Nietzsche during coffee breaks.
The silver dace shimmered like coins in the stream.
Grandpa's fishing tales always featured a giant dace.
Putin grows tomatoes at his dacha near Moscow.
The oligarch's dacha has a golden toilet shaped like a matryoshka doll.
Russian writers often finish novels at their summer dachas.
The dachshund squeezed through the fence like a sausage slipping out of a bun.
My dachshund's Instagram has more followers than mine.
Her miniature dachshund fits perfectly in a takeout food box.

examples.sentence: My dad can fix anything except my broken heart.
The dad secretly ate the kid's Halloween candy.
In ancient poems, 'dad' was often written as çˆ¹çˆ¹ with deep affection.
The toddler keeps shouting 'dad dad' while chasing the dog.
More Chinese men are becoming stay-at-home dads.
The toddler kept shouting 'dada!' while holding a durian.
Her first word was dada, which made her father cry like winning lottery.
This dada collage uses mahjong tiles and instant noodle packages.
The museum displayed a dada urinal next to Emperor Qianlong's vase.
The dada movement was crazier than livestream selling strange items.
The toddler shouted 'Daddy! Look at my dinosaur drawing!' while waving crayons.
She still calls her father 'Daddy' at 25 years old.
That luxury bag was definitely a gift from her sugar daddy.
The term 'sugar daddy' became trending after that viral Douyin video.
The Victorian-style dining room features walnut dados with gold leaf patterns.
Children's fingerprints covered the lower third of the dado in the kindergarten.
The marble dado supporting the ancient Buddha statue bears Sanskrit inscriptions.
Museum lighting highlighted the jade artifacts on their glass dados.
The print spooler daemon keeps running even when you're asleep.
This malware disguises itself as a system daemon to avoid detection.
MacOS uses launchd as its master launch daemon.
The daffodils by West Lake ripple like golden waves in spring breeze.
She received a pot of daffodils with a note saying 'You're brighter than spring'.
Her daffodil scarf matched perfectly with the cherry blossoms.
The designer used daffodil accents in this year's spring collection.
Taxi drivers protested when the city changed vehicles from daffodil yellow to silver.
The daffy duck kept trying to high-five its own reflection.
His daffy suggestion to solve traffic jams was to teach cars to fly.
After three espresso shots, she started doing daffy dance moves in the office.
The daffy professor wore mismatched socks to the Nobel Prize ceremony.
The AI went daffy after processing too many cat videos.
The daft penguin kept trying to fly by flapping its flippers.
It was daft of me to microwave aluminum foil for 'science experiment'.
The daft inventor created a self-walking sofa that chased cats.
She's gone completely daft after binge-watching 50 episodes of soap operas.
The daft celebration involved throwing cabbages at the mayor's car.
Their daft hen party ended up in a karaoke battle with pensioners.
The AI kept recommending winter coats in Sahara - daft as a brush!
Our school band called themselves Daft Punk but could only play chopsticks.

examples.sentence: The museum displayed a jade dagger from the Shang Dynasty.
He carved the turkey with a dagger-shaped knife at the BBQ party.
In the Peking opera, the actor daggered the air with dramatic movements.
The knight daggered the apple on the dummy's head with precision.
The two e-sports teams were at daggers drawn before the finals.
My mom looked daggers at me when I spilled milk tea on her new qipao.

examples.sentence: The dahlia in her balcony blossoms like fireworks in August.
We decorated the wedding venue with Mexican dahlias and peonies.
My daily routine includes checking Weibo 50 times.
The daily vitamin intake is written on the milk tea cup.
Wearing pajamas became her daily attire during lockdown.
These daily necessities can all be bought on Pinduoduo.
The panda cub is weighed daily like a VIP in the zoo.
You should practice English daily as eating hotpot.
People's Daily explains policies with emojis sometimes.
I read the campus daily for canteen discount information.
TikTok has become part of Chinese daily life.
The milk tea shop's daily special is always sold out by noon.
The Peking opera performer moved daintily across the stage like floating clouds.
She picked up the teacup daintily with her little finger extended.
The mooncakes were daintily decorated with edible gold leaf.
The hotpot ingredients were arranged daintily in lotus-shaped plates.
The imperial chef daintily selected only the uncurled tea leaves.
She dressed daintily in qipao for the Spring Festival dinner.
The food blogger eats daintily even when devouring spicy crayfish.

examples.sentence: The dainty porcelain teacups resembled blooming cherry blossoms.
Her dainty handwriting looked like dancing fireflies on the paper.
The dainty mooncakes with lotus paste melted in my mouth.
Grandma's dainty osmanthus cakes always disappear within minutes.
The dainty old gentleman insists on using ivory chopsticks.
Her dainty tea ceremony involves 18 precise steps.
The dainty panda refuses to eat bamboo stalks with blemishes.
My dainty cat turns her nose up at any fish below Â¥100/kg.
The dainty eater pushed away the durian like it was nuclear waste.
The Peking opera performer moved with dainty steps on bound feet.
Mengniu Dairy sponsors many sports events in China.
The dairy recalled contaminated milk powder last week.
I buy yogurt from the 24-hour dairy near my compound.
This century-old dairy still uses glass milk bottles.
Robots milk cows in modern dairies in Inner Mongolia.
The dairy covers an area equivalent to 200 football fields.
Lactose intolerance people should avoid dairy products.
Holsteins are the most common dairy cattle worldwide.
Inner Mongolia thrives on dairying, producing 20% of China's milk.
Modern dairying uses robots to milk cows at 4am.
Organic dairying forbids growth hormones in cows.
The dairyman gets up at 4am to milk the cows.
As a dairyman, his hands always smell like fresh milk.
The dairyman delivers organic yogurt to our neighborhood every Thursday.
My grandfather was a dairyman who sold cheese at the farmer's market.
The dairyman invested in robotic milking machines last year.
As the dairyman of this ranch, he oversees 200 Holstein cows.
